bibl.title: Crossing the Stages: The Production, Performance and Reception of Ancient Theater. Selected Papers Presented at a Conference Held in Saskatoon, Saskatchewan, 22-25 October 1997
bibl.seg: CSAPO Eric, Performance and Iconographic Tradition in the Illustrations of Menander.

John PORTER, Eric CSAPO, C.W. MARSHALL and Robert C. KETTERER (Edd.), Crossing the Stages: The Production, Performance and Reception of Ancient Theater. Selected Papers Presented at a Conference Held in Saskatoon, Saskatchewan, 22-25 October 1997 = Syllecta Classica. 10 (Iowa City, 1999) pp. 154-188.
